name: Introduction to C Programming
details: C programming is a versatile, procedural language known for its efficiency, low-level memory control, and widespread use in system and application development.

name: Introduction to Algorithms
details: An algorithm is a step-by-step set of instructions or rules used in problem-solving and computation, guiding a computer or human through a specific task or process.

name: Introduction to C++ for DSA
details: C++ is a high-level programming language known for its speed and versatility, often used for system software, games, and complex applications, with strong support for object-oriented programming.

name: Basic Data Structures
details: Basic data structures are fundamental tools for organizing and storing data efficiently. Examples include arrays, lists, stacks, and queues, pivotal in computer science and programming.

name: Introduction to OOP Python
details: Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) in Python is a programming paradigm that structures code around objects, bundling data and methods for efficient, modular, and reusable code design.

name: Software Engineering
details: Software Engineering is the systematic application of principles, methods, and tools to design, develop, and maintain software systems efficiently and effectively.

name: AWS, Cloud Computing
details: Amazon Web Services (AWS) is a leading cloud computing platform offering scalable, on-demand resources and services for businesses worldwide.

name: Database (MySQL)
details: MySQL is an open-source relational database management system (RDBMS) that stores and manages structured data, widely used for web applications and business software.

name: Problem-Solving Part
details: Problem-solving is the skill of finding effective solutions to challenges by analyzing, strategizing, and taking action, fostering innovation and achieving desired outcomes.
